title: Battle Royale
synopsis: The Japanese government introduces a system whereby randomly chosen schoolchildren are taken to an island and forced to fight each other to the death.

title: Letters from Iwo Jima
synopsis: As tens of thousands of Allied troops push further inland, the Japanese troops defending Iwo Jima during World War II prepare to meet their fate.

title: Akira
synopsis: In this animated film based on the anime series, two childhood friends are pulled into the underworld of Neo-Tokyo and forced to fight for survival.

title: Rashomon
synopsis: What is true? What is false? Several witnesses see an event differently in Akira Kurosawa's Oscar-winning masterpiece.

title: Ghost in the Shell
synopsis: In this cyberpunk anime classic, a government cyborg is tasked with apprehending a hacker who's taking over the minds of computer-enhanced humans.

title: Attack on Titan
synopsis: With his hometown in ruins, young Eren Yeager becomes determined to fight back against the giant Titans that threaten to destroy the human race.

title: Ran
synopsis: Director Akira Kurosawa re-envisions Shakespeare's tragedy 'King Lear' through the eyes of a warlord who transfers his kingdom to his eldest son.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
synopsis: After both suffer physical damage -- brothers Edward and Alphonse battle nefarious forces to try to reclaim their bodies in this supernatural anime.

title: Cowboy Bebop
synopsis: Decades in the future, mankind abandons Earth to populate the rest of the solar system, where crime syndicates rise to compete with local government.

title: Audition
synopsis: A widower decides it's time to date again, but the woman he has chosen has a taste for torture in director Takashi Miike's graphic horror film.

title: Paprika
synopsis: Reality and the dream world are on a collision course after a device that can record dreams is stolen from a psychiatric research facility.

title: Ringu
synopsis: After her niece dies mysteriously, a journalist investigates a strange videotape that allegedly kills anyone who views it exactly one week later.

title: Dragon Ball Z
synopsis: Now happily married and with a son, martial arts champion Goku must defend Earth from a series of extraterrestrial invaders bent on destruction.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
synopsis: Brothers Edward and Alphonse use alchemy to resurrect their mother, but they unleash a chemical reaction that tears apart their bodies.

title: Ichi the Killer
synopsis: Filmmaker Takashi Miike takes inspiration from Hideo Yamamoto's manga, Koroshiya, to tell this bloody and bleak tale about the Japanese yakuza.

title: 5 Centimeters Per Second
synopsis: Inseparable fourth-graders Takaki Tonoo and Akari Shinohara -- bonded by a love of books -- begin to slowly drift apart when their families relocate.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the

title: Dragon Ball
synopsis: Young Goku sets off on a quest with his teenage friend Bulma to find the seven Dragon Balls, which grant whoever possesses them a single wish.

title: Bleach
synopsis: After teenager Ichigo Kurosaki acquires superpowers from wounded soul reaper Rukia Kuchiki, the two of them join forces to round up lost souls.

title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
synopsis: Set in the year 2071, this engaging animated tale follows an eclectic crew of space bounty hunters as they hunt down a biochemical terrorist on Mars.

title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
synopsis: A high-schooler who's granted powers to make anyone instantly obedient dons a mask to lead Japan's rebellion against a long-invading Britannia.

title: Ju-on: The Grudge
synopsis: A nurse learns that the house she's visiting is cursed by two murders that happened there, and the vengeful spirits will kill anyone who enters.

title: Samurai Champloo
synopsis: After a waitress saves two warriors from execution, she demands that they accompany her on a journey to find 'a samurai who smells of sunflowers.'

title: Confessions
synopsis: A young schoolteacher seeks revenge against the adolescent students she believes to be responsible for her daughter's death.

title: Jiro Dreams of Sushi
synopsis: This documentary profiles sushi chef Jiro Ono, an 85-year-old master whose 10-seat, $300-a-plate restaurant is legendary among Tokyo foodies.

title: Steins;Gate
synopsis: A mad scientist and his friends invent a microwave phone that sends text messages into the past and allows them to travel through time.

title: Sword Art Online
synopsis: A video game whiz helps create a new technology that enables players to guide their online avatars with their own bodies -- but a dark twist emerges.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Gods
synopsis: When Bills, the God of Destruction, arrives on Earth to pick a fight with a worthy opponent, the gang invokes a powerful Super Saiyan God to stop him.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
synopsis: Tokyo is haunted by ghouls who resemble humans but feast on their flesh. As a ghoul-human hybrid, Ken Kaneki finds himself caught between two worlds.

title: The Garden of Words
synopsis: When a lonely teenager skips his morning classes to sit in a lovely garden, he meets a mysterious older woman who shares his feelings of alienation.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the

title: Lupin the 3rd: The Castle of Cagliostro: Special Edition
synopsis: Lupin, his sidekick, Jigen, and the samurai warrior Goemon set out to take over an evil counterfeit operation at Count Cagliostro's fortress.

title: Battle Royale 2
synopsis: Led by Shuya Nanahara, a terrorist group determined to destroy the Japanese regime that tried to kill them launches a crushing attack on Tokyo.

title: A Silent Voice
synopsis: A former class bully reaches out to the deaf girl he'd tormented in grade school. He feels unworthy of redemption but tries to make things right.

title: Suicide Club
synopsis: After 54 schoolgirls simultaneously jump in front of a train in the middle of Tokyo, the whole country becomes plagued with similar tragedies.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F'
synopsis: Two of Freeza's minions, Tagoma and Sorbet, head to Earth to use Dragon Balls to resurrect him. But Vegeta and Goku won't allow that without a fight.

title: Tetsuo: The Iron Man
synopsis: After he accidentally runs down a man with a fetish for implanting scrap metal into his body, a businessman begins morphing into a hybrid man-machine.

title: In the Realm of the Senses
synopsis: Against a backdrop of growing imperialism, a Japanese businessman and his mistress give in to an all-consuming sexual and romantic obsession.

title: Fairy Tail
synopsis: When four young wizards team up to take jobs across the kingdom, they forge a bond more powerful than any magic and grow stronger with every mission.

title: One Missed Call
synopsis: Possessed cell phones predict their owners' deaths. One by one, Yumi's friends receive calls on their cell phones from themselves in the future.

title: Dragon Ball Super
synopsis: The God of Destruction, Beerus awakens from a prophetic dream, predicting that a worthy opponent will rise. Will Goku be the one to take him on?

title: Steamboy
synopsis: Genius teen inventor Ray Steam receives a strange spherical device containing a mind-boggling new form of energy that can power a whole country.

title: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex
synopsis: This manga-inspired anime follows the intrepid Section 9 security force in their ongoing efforts to battle crime and cyberterrorism.

title: Rurouni Kenshin
synopsis: A nomadic swordsman arrives at a martial arts school in Meiji-era Japan, where he lands in the middle of a conflict involving the opium trade.

title: InuYasha
synopsis: Yanked down a well, schoolgirl Kagome Higurashi emerges in feudal Japan, where she must reassemble a sacred jewel while eluding half-demon InuYasha.

title: Erased
synopsis: Aspiring manga artist Satoru inadvertently travels back through time, enabling him to prevent fatalities from occurring to people near him.

title: Erased
synopsis: Satoru Fujinuma can travel back in time to save others' lives. When he wakes up 18 years in the past, he has a chance to save his murdered classmates.

title: Shinobi: Heart Under Blade
synopsis: In Ten Shimoyama's ninja thriller, it's X-Men meets Romeo and Juliet when Gennosuke, from the Koga clan, falls for Oboro, from the rival Iga clan.

title: Ringu 2
synopsis: Stringy-haired Sadako returns in this chilling sequel to the film that spawned a fear of unlabeled videotapes. On a quest to find out what happened to her beau, Mai Takano learns about a strange movie that kills the viewer one week after watching it.

title: The Place Promised in Our Early Days
synopsis: Japan is under two regimes after the country's loss in World War II. Hokkaido remains under Japanese rule while America holds the rest.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the

title: Psycho-Pass
synopsis: In the year 2113, people are given brain scans to determine how likely they are to commit a crime. Those who fail are apprehended, or even killed.

title: Children Who Chase Lost Voices
synopsis: While listening to her deceased father's crystal radio, a lonely orphan follows a magical stream of music to a land of beauty, danger and temptation.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the

title: Kenshin OAV Tsuioku Hen
synopsis: To uphold his school's pledge to protect the weak and the innocent, the ronin Kenshin joins the revolution against the Tokugawa shogunate.

title: Attack on Titan: Part 1
synopsis: Humanity lives behind walls in fear of the Titans, cruel giants who eat people. Eren Yeager and his friend Armin join the Survey Corps to fight back.

title: Harlock: Space Pirate
synopsis: Determined to keep the malevolent Gaia Coalition from ruling the universe, a mysterious loner cruises the skies and boldly attacks enemy spaceships.

title: Mushi-Shi
synopsis: This award-winning anime series brings the viewer into a dreamlike world where ghostly organisms called Mushi hover on the borders of perception.

title: Love Exposure
synopsis: Desperate to please his sin-obsessed Catholic priest father, young Yu takes to sinning big time, becoming a master of up-skirt photography and perfecting the ninja moves required to get just the right angle on his subjects in this four-hour epic.

title: Yu Yu Hakusho: Ghost Files
synopsis: After dying to save a boy, delinquent tough guy Yusuke Urameshi is granted another chance at life by redeeming himself as a 'Spirit Detective.'

title: Cold Fish
synopsis: A cunning psychopath befriends the downtrodden owner of a rival tropical fish store and lures him into a twisted world of depravity and murder.

title: Black Lagoon
synopsis: A successful Japanese businessman, presumed dead after he's abducted by pirates, reinvigorates his life by joining his captors.

title: Angel Beats
synopsis: In a high school that's a way station to the afterlife, a teenager gets caught up in the battle for the rights of those in this purgatorial world.

title: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc I - The Egg of the King
synopsis: Loner Guts is recruited by Griffith and his band of mercenaries, but their ensuing success as a full-fledged army could lead to a horrible fate.

title: Blue Exorcist
synopsis: Determined to throw off the curse of being Satan's illegitimate son, Rin enters the True Cross Academy to become an exorcist, just like his mentor.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Fusion Reborn
synopsis: When a teenage ogre inadvertently opens a door to the Other World, Earth is flooded with the spirits of evil beings -- including a bevy of Dragon Ball scoundrels -- and the adolescent is transformed into a colossal monster named Janemba.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Broly - The Legendary Super Saiyan
synopsis: While the Saiyan Paragus persuades Vegeta to rule a new planet, King Kai alerts Goku of the South Galaxy's destruction by an unknown Super Saiyan.

title: Ju-On 2
synopsis: Returning to the evil abode used to such chilling effect in Ju-On, this creepy second installment introduces new victims to the dwelling's curse.

title: Gantz:O
synopsis: Teams of recently deceased people who've been revived and given high-tech weapons must cooperate to defeat an army of monsters in Tokyo and Osaka.

title: Kill la Kill
synopsis: The 'woman with the scissor blade' -- Ryuko Matoi -- searches for clues all around the world for the truth behind her father's death.

title: Deadman Wonderland
synopsis: Falsely convicted for the mass murder of his classmates, a schoolboy must endure a nightmarish penal system, all while trying to prove his innocence.

title: Fate/Zero
synopsis: After three unsettled battles for the mystical Holy Grail, an artifact that grants a miracle to those who hold it, a fourth war begins.

title: No Game No Life
synopsis: Legendary gamer siblings Sora and Shiro are transported to a world where life is a series of games and humanity is in grave danger of extinction.

title: BERSERK: The Golden Age Arc II - The Battle for Doldrey
synopsis: For three years, Guts believed his mission was to pursue Griffith's dream together with him. But in order to become Griffith's equal and truly be called his friend, Guts realizes he will have to leave the Band of the Hawk.

title: Another
synopsis: A teenager encounters a mysterious girl while he is hospitalized. When he later sees her at school, he doesn't understand why no one else notices her.

title: Noragami
synopsis: Though he's a deity, nobody really worships Yato. But after he teams with a young girl, the pair sets out to bring him the recognition he craves.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Wrath of the Dragon
synopsis: The Z Fighters face a new challenge when an industrial disaster blasts open the door between worlds, unleashing an ancient monster.

title: Your Lie in April
synopsis: After his mother's death, a piano prodigy's will to play disappears. But meeting a free-spirited girl who plays the violin turns his life around.

title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
synopsis: High schooler Haruhi Suzumiya wants to live in a world where aliens, psychics and time travelers are real. To make it happen, she starts a club.

title: Saint Seiya
synopsis: A band of young warriors in magical armor vow to defend the reincarnation of Greek goddess Athena against evil forces and to return her to the throne.

title: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc III - The Advent
synopsis: A year after he left the Band of the Hawk, Guts rejoins them in an epic battle to vanquish the God Hand and save Griffith from a hellish fate.

title: Why Don't You Play in Hell?
synopsis: The bitter feuds and unrequited loves that bind two warring Yakuza clans are intensified by the comical interference of a guerrilla film crew.

title: Clannad
synopsis: Alienated Tomoya goes through high school by rote until he meets Nagisa, who's been ill. When she decides to restart the Drama Club, his life changes.

title: Sweet Bean
synopsis: The master of a dorayaki pastry store hires a 76-year-old woman whose talents attract customers from all over. But she's hiding a troubling secret.

title: PATEMA INVERTED
synopsis: Patema slips out of her underground world into one that's upside down, where she immediately falls in love with a local student named Age.

title: Ghost in the Shell: Solid State Society
synopsis: Major Kusanagi quits Section 9 after a rash of refugee suicides, leaving her colleagues to battle the hacker known as the Puppeteer without her.

title: Fist of the North Star
synopsis: Martial artist Kenshiro wanders the Earth after a nuclear war, dispensing justice with his brutal power. The warlords and gangs don't stand a chance.

title: Dragon Ball Z: The Return of Cooler
synopsis: Goku and his allies face two major threats: a 'living planet' with a powerful army at its disposal, and an old nemesis that lurks inside.

title: Dragon Ball Z: The Tree of Might
synopsis: Goku and friends must stop a band of space pirates from consuming fruit from the Tree of Might before it's destructive powers drain Earth's energy.

title: Toradora!
synopsis: Menacing in appearance but gentle at heart, Ryuji forms an unlikely friendship with Taiga, a tiny girl with a sharp tongue and a tough attitude.

title: Madoka Magica
synopsis: One day, Madoka Kaname has a very magical encounter, one that can change her destiny. This is the beginning of the new story of magical witch girls.

title: Dragon Ball Z: The Dead Zone
synopsis: In this entry in the Dragon Ball Z anime franchise, the vengeful Garlic Jr. kidnaps Gohan in his quest to gain control over all the Dragon Balls.

title: The Disappearance of Haruhi Suzumiya
synopsis: SOS Brigade chief Haruhi Suzumiya announces that they are going to hold a Christmas party, but a couple of days later, Haruhi goes missing.

title: Durarara!!
synopsis: A young man looking for excitement moves to Ikebukuro, a district in Tokyo, where he finds a world of mystery in which the past and present mesh.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Super Android 13
synopsis: The world is under siege in this entry in the Dragon Ball Z series, and only Goku and his friends can put a stop to a plot by an android army.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Cooler's Revenge
synopsis: After defeating Frieza on Namek, Goku now faces his vengeful brother, Cooler, who has come to Earth to eradicate the last remnants of the Saiyan race.

title: Goemon
synopsis: This thriller follows the exploits of a ninja who leaves his clan after its chief is murdered and uses his skills as a thief to help the poor.

title: Devilman Crybaby
synopsis: With demons reawakened and humanity in turmoil, a sensitive demon-boy is led into a brutal, degenerate war against evil by his mysterious friend, Ryo.

title: One Piece Film Z
synopsis: Luffy and his gang save a disillusioned Navy admiral named Z who has one goal -- to slaughter every pirate in the world, including the Straw Hats.

title: I Wish
synopsis: Young lad Koichi and his kid brother hatch a wildly imaginative plan to use a new bullet train to reconnect their estranged parents.

title: Dragon Ball Z: The World's Strongest
synopsis: Goku must come to the rescue of Piccolo and Roshi after they are kidnapped to serve as hosts to the reawakened brain of evil scientist Dr. Wheelo.

title: Fruits Basket
synopsis: Yuki's family harbors a strange secret: If any of them are hugged by a member of the opposite sex, they transform into animals of the Chinese zodiac.

title: Strange Circus
synopsis: A suicidal teen is forced to watch her parents' lovemaking from a peephole, then is sexually abused by her father after her mother's suspicious death.

title: When the Last Sword Is Drawn
synopsis: Yôjirô Takita's period drama recounts the life of samurai Kanichiro Yoshimura -- a controversial character -- and the waning days of feudal Japan.

title: Lesson of the Evil
synopsis: Seiji Hasumi is a popular teacher who has a gift for dealing with students' problems, but beneath that facade lies a sociopathic killer.

title: Royal Space Force: Wings of Honneamise
synopsis: An aimless kid named Shiro finds purpose through his nation's space program and, with the help of his devout friend, becomes the first man in space.

title: Gin Tama
synopsis: After Japan's Shogunate is occupied by an alien army, a samurai forced to work as a handyman forms a squad of swordsmen to fight back.

title: Re: Life in a different world from zero
synopsis: On his way home from the convenience store, teenager Subaru Natsuki is transported to another world, where he gains the power to reverse time by dying.

title: Mob Psycho 100
synopsis: There's an organization gathering espers for a nefarious purpose. Powerful psychic Mob, however, is just trying to be the protagonist of his own life.

title: Mob Psycho 100
synopsis: Middle schooler Shigeo looks normal, but he's secretly a formidable psychic whose powers threaten to break free unless he represses his emotions.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Bojack Unbound
synopsis: The Z fighters battle the evil Bojack and his gang as they infiltrate a worldwide martial arts tournament in hopes of taking over the universe.

title: Devil May Cry
synopsis: This eye-popping animated series follows the adventures of Dante, the half-human demon hunter who tracks down even the most menacing of demons.

title: Trigun: Badlands Rumble
synopsis: Set in a remote town bounded by quicksand, this action-packed 'space Western' anime centers on a former outlaw whose past suddenly catches up to him.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Lord Slug
synopsis: Goku and Krillin manage to deflect an asteroid that's on a collision course with Earth. But a new enemy emerges from its surface: the evil Lord Slug.

title: In This Corner of the World
synopsis: Suzu marries into a family living outside of Hiroshima and quickly settles into her new life, until World War II challenges her ability to survive.

title: Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works
synopsis: High school students Rin and Shiro pair up as allies when they're chosen to compete in a secret tournament for possession of the Holy Grail.

title: Dragon Ball Z: The History of Trunks
synopsis: In an alternate future, Goku has died from a heart disease and it's up to his son Gohan to train Trunks to fight alongside him and save the Earth.

title: Godzilla
synopsis: A desperate group of refugees attempts to recolonize Earth 20,000 years after Godzilla took over. But one young man wants revenge above all else.

title: Ranma 1/2
synopsis: After a dip in a cursed spring, the heir to a martial arts dojo turns into a girl whenever he is splashed with cold water. His fiancée is not amused.

title: Paranormal Activity 2: Tokyo Night
synopsis: After a Japanese student visits America, she returns home to discover that an evil entity has traveled with her and is intent on harming her family.

title: Be with You
synopsis: While on a walk with his young son, a widower encounters a woman with no memory who looks exactly like his late wife, and they begin a life together.

title: Full Metal Panic!
synopsis: Popular high school student Kaname Chidori possesses the powers of 'the Whispered,' making her a target of a deadly terror organization.

title: Fires on the Plain
synopsis: A tubercular Japanese private fighting in the Philippines must endure the unimaginable to survive when his own platoon turns him away.

title: Saint Seiya: Legend of Sanctuary
synopsis: In this sixth film based on the manga series, a girl with mysterious powers joins an epic battle against an ancient evil threat called 'Gold Saints.'

title: When They Cry
synopsis: New to rural Hinamizawa, Keiichi discovers a series of murders in its past. But his new friends refuse to speak of them and seem to be monitoring him.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: The Sacred Star of Milos
synopsis: In this sequel to Fullmetal Alchemist, the Elric brothers travel to the land of Milos, where people are rebelling against their masters.

title: Guilty of Romance
synopsis: A detective's investigation of a grisly murder leads her to a sexually frustrated housewife and a professor who moonlights as a prostitute.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Bardock – The Father of Goku
synopsis: In this extended episode set before the main series, Goku faces his past by searching for his father, Bardock, who abandoned him when he was young.

title: Tag
synopsis: The sole survivor of a freak school bus accident, a shy Japanese high schooler finds herself in a surreal -- and very violent -- alternate universe.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
synopsis: In the energy-scarce future, the paramilitary group Celestial Being wages a war to end war using Gundams, technologically advanced piloted robots.

title: Noriko's Dinner Table
synopsis: Told in parallel to the pop-horror film 'Suicide Club,' a runaway teen's new and exciting life in Tokyo turns ugly after a mass suicide.

title: One Piece Film: Strong World
synopsis: Legendary pirate Shiki reappears in East Blue planning to destroy the World Government. When he kidnaps Nami, the Straw Hats confront a strange land.

title: Fate/stay night
synopsis: Inspired by his father, a schoolboy who was orphaned in a massive fire uses magic to bring justice to a world at war over a sacred chalice.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Bio-Broly
synopsis: Goku and his sons thought they had destroyed the evil Broly, who seemingly perished in battle. But little do they know that he's planning a comeback with the help of a pair of criminals who are assisting him in his world domination.

title: Samurai 7
synopsis: As villages perish under the thumb of a cruel race of warriors, a young priestess named Kirara travels the countryside gathering stray samurais.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Broly - Broly Second Coming
synopsis: While hunting for Dragon Balls, the life force energy of Goten and Trunks reawakens Broly, who's still hell-bent on destroying the universe.

title: Attack on Titan: Part 2
synopsis: With a transformed Eren in custody, secrets are revealed and plans are made. Eren, Mikasa and Armin fight with the Survey Corps for all humankind.

title: Kuroko's Basketball
synopsis: Five middle school basketball stars went to separate high schools, and now Tetsuya Kuroko and Seirin High are making their play for glory.

title: Daeho
synopsis: In 1925 Korea, Japanese rulers demand the last remaining tiger be killed. The tiger easily defeats his pursuers until a legendary hunter takes him on.

title: GTO: Great Teacher Onizuka
synopsis: One-time juvenile delinquent Onizuka finds his old tricks give him an edge when he starts teaching a class of unruly high school students.

title: Basilisk
synopsis: The year is 1614, and two warring ninja clans each support a different son of the ailing ruler as the next shogun in this anime adventure.

title: Slam Dunk 1
synopsis: Basketball and old history tangle when Hanamichi realizes that his old crush is now a student at Takezono High, against whom his team is playing.

title: Slam Dunk
synopsis: High school delinquent Hanamichi Sakuragi joins the basketball team, discovering his talent for the sport while striving for the championship.

title: Swallowtail Butterfly
synopsis: An orphaned teenage girl is raised by a prostitute and the surrounding neighborhood of immigrants, petty thieves and scavengers.

title: Ghost in the Shell Arise
synopsis: In the year 2027, young cyborg Motoko Kusanagi unamicably leaves a federal clandestine organization to help form a new unit, later known as Section 9.

title: Yakuza Apocalypze
synopsis: When a rival gang beheads his vampire Yakuza boss, underling Kageyama inherits his power and immortality and sets out to get blood-soaked revenge.

title: As the Gods Will
synopsis: High schooler Shun Takahata's ordinary life is shattered when his teacher's head explodes and he and his classmates are forced to play deadly games.

title: Empire of Passion
synopsis: After their intensely passionate affair leads to the murder of her husband, an older woman and her young lover become haunted with guilt.

title: Ping Pong
synopsis: Two completely opposite high school students who were once childhood pals, 'Peco' Hoshino and 'Smile' Tsukimoto, find themselves pitted against one another in an extreme sports version of ping pong.

title: EDEN OF THE EAST
synopsis: Waking naked outside the White House, Akira Takizawa has no memory -- and his only clues are the gun and cell phone he holds in his hands.

title: Yuri on Ice
synopsis: Figure skater Yuri Katsuki flops in his latest season. When five-time world champion Victor Nikiforov becomes his coach, he gets another chance.

title: Himizu
synopsis: Sumida (Shometani) and his schoolmate Keiko (Nikaido) are 15 year old school kids living a dystopian existence where each of their parents hope and encourage them to die. Set in tsunami-hit areas of Japan, which are used as a backdrop.

title: One Missed Call 2
synopsis: This gory sequel continues the now-legendary premise: Your cell phone rings. When you answer, you hear your own terrifying death. Moments -- or days -- later, you meet the violent demise you heard on the phone. But now the curse has gained strength.

title: Planetes
synopsis: In the late 21st century, a salaryman with the dream of owning his own spaceship joins the division of a spaceship that handles cleaning space debris.

title: Ghost in the Shell: The New Movie
synopsis: In the wake of World War IV and the assassination of Japan's prime minister, Maj. Motoko Kusanagi and her elite team uncover a vast cyber-conspiracy.

title: Creepy
synopsis: Profiler turned lecturer Koichi is drawn back into his old job when his colleagues ask for his help on an unsolved case. Then things get weird.

title: The Devil Is a Part-Timer!
synopsis: Thwarted in their attempt to take over the world of Ente Isla, Satan and his general Alciel land in modern-day Tokyo, where they take on human form.

title: Battles Without Honor and Humanity
synopsis: A former Japanese soldier goes to prison for murder and becomes sworn brothers with a yakuza inmate. Soon, he's swept into a violent street war.

title: Bakemonogatari
synopsis: After a peculiar homeless man makes him human again, ex-vampire Koyomi helps other high school students with their own supernatural predicaments.

title: Conan, The Boy in Future
synopsis: Born to a small group of survivors after a world disaster, a boy and his pals use their powers to fight evil forces that want to rule Earth.

title: Conan, The Boy in Future
synopsis: In the 21st century, a devastating war has left only scattered islands of survivors, but a young boy and his sweetheart represent hope for the future.

title: One Piece Film: Gold
synopsis: Luffy and his pirates can't wait to board the glittering Sin City ship known as Gran Tesoro, but they soon find themselves in way over their heads.

title: Food Wars!: Shokugeki no Soma
synopsis: Young chef Soma enters the prestigious Totsuki Culinary Academy, where he must emerge victorious in over-the-top cooking battles or face expulsion.

title: Full Metal Panic: The Second Raid
synopsis: Join antiterror operative Sousuke Sagara as he looks to protect high school student Kaname Chidori and thwart the devious plots of his adversaries.

title: Heavenly Forest
synopsis: A shy college photography buff forms a bond with a cute classmate who abruptly disappears from his life when he develops feelings for another girl.

title: Gate of Hell
synopsis: After saving his lord from a coup, a samurai is promised anything his heart desires. Tragically, he desires the married Lady Kesa's hand in marriage.

title: Tokyo Tribe
synopsis: This stylized musical crime saga pits the most notorious and ruthless gangs of Tokyo against each other, all set to a heavy hip-hop beat.

title: Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress
synopsis: In the midst of the industrial revolution, a mysterious virus turns the infected into the undead, urging Ikoma to join the fight to save humankind.

title: Full Metal Panic? Fumoffu
synopsis: When their high school is under siege, anime heroes Sousuke and Kaname take on yet another dangerous mission that has them wiping out a deadly menace.

title: Crying Out Love in the Center of the World
synopsis: When his fiancée stumbles on an old tape he made during high school, Sakutaro becomes consumed by memories of young romance, adventure and tragedy.

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
synopsis: Multiple generations of the Joestar family -- all with the same nickname -- confront supernatural villains through a series of time periods.

title: Log Horizon
synopsis: When thousands of players get stuck inside an online video game, a reclusive gamer and his pals form an alliance to navigate the game's perils.

title: Berserk
synopsis: A demonic curse and a thirst for vengeance drive a swordsman and his allies on a quest to hunt down the man responsible for his situation.

title: Go
synopsis: As he comes of age, a Japanese-born Korean boy struggles with the future, love, cultural identity and Japan's ubiquitous racism.

title: Overlord II
synopsis: Momonga continues his journey with his allies, while the consequences of Ainz Ooal Gown's actions reverberate through the game-like world he inhabits.

title: Overlord
synopsis: In 2138, the last player of the online game Yggdrasil somehow stays logged in after its shutdown. Now he's on a quest to learn what happened and why.

title: Detroit Metal City
synopsis: When a singer moves to Tokyo from the country, he gives up his dreams of pop stardom to be the front man for a hard-driving death metal group.

title: The Professional: GOLGO 13
synopsis: Contract killer Duke Togo (aka Golgo 13) evades the Mafia, corrupt government agents and assassins as he tracks a mob boss he's been hired to kill.

title: Haikyu!! II
synopsis: Vertically challenged Hinata continues to follow his volleyball dream as the team heads to a special training camp in Tokyo.

title: Btooom!
synopsis: A jobless young man who lives with his mother awakens on a remote island and realizes he has become trapped inside his favorite combat video game.

title: The Great Yokai War
synopsis: When shy city boy Tadashi moves in with his grandpa, he ends up stumbling into a colorful world of ancient spirits that he is strangely able to see.

title: Magi: The Labyrinth of Magic
synopsis: A land of mysterious ruins and a magical treasure hunt await young Aladdin and his courageous friend Alibaba for the adventure of their lives.

title: Alien vs. Ninja
synopsis: When a strange fireball crashes near their village, a mighty ninja clan goes to investigate and winds up in serious danger from alien creatures.

title: Shield of Straw
synopsis: A team of detectives must protect a suspect with a price on his head on a cross-country journey. Every bounty hunter in Japan wants him dead.

title: Kino's Journey
synopsis: A wanderer named Kino travels the world with a talking motorbike named Hermes, staying no longer than three days in every destination.

title: Ghost in the Shell: S.A.C. 2nd GIG
synopsis: In the future, a cybernetic special-operations task force grapples with terrorism and government corruption in the wake of a refugee crisis.

title: Rurôni Kenshin: Ishin shishi e no Requiem
synopsis: Shigure lost friends and family in the war against the Tokugawa Shogunate and is out for revenge, but one man stands in his way: Kenshin Himura.

title: Prison School
synopsis: Five male best friends enroll at Hachimitsu Academy when the school goes co-ed. After they're caught being voyeurs, they're taken to the Prison Block.

title: Prison School
synopsis: The five male students of a formerly all-girls school must contend with the draconian Underground School Council and their own lascivious desires.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
synopsis: Young Gundam pilot Kira Yamato is drawn into the war between the people of Earth and its orbital colonies when the neutral Orb Union is attacked.

title: Doraemon
synopsis: Sent from the future to help young underachiever Nobita succeed, earless robotic cat Doraemon has a wealth of gadgets in his magic pocket to assist.

title: Gunslinger Girl
synopsis: On the surface, the Social Welfare Agency appears to help orphaned schoolgirls, but it's actually turning them into lethal agents.

title: HK: Forbidden Super Hero
synopsis: Kyosuke Shikijo is a schoolboy with a secret desire to wear women's underwear, which transforms him into the bizarre superhero Pervert Mask.

title: Saint Seiya: The Hades Chapter - Sanctuary
synopsis: Hades, God of the Underworld awakens after Athena's seal that kept him at bay is broken. A new holy war begins as the spirits of his army are freed.

title: Saint Seiya: The Hades Chapter - Inferno 1
synopsis: The Bronze Knights descend to the Underworld where they must cross the river Archeron. The battles intensify as Hades' powerful lieutenants await.

title: KonoSuba: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World 2
synopsis: Kazuma and Aqua's quests continue as they and the rest of their party level up while trying to avoid the powerful Devil King and his minions.

title: KonoSuba: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World
synopsis: Teenage shut-in Kazuma dies ignominiously and the goddess Aqua offers him reincarnation in a game-like fantasy world. He accepts, taking her along.

title: Seraph of the End
synopsis: After a deadly viral plague, the few child survivors become livestock for the vampires taking over the world. But one group is fighting back.

title: Blue Spring Ride
synopsis: High schooler Futaba Yoshioka gets a second chance to win the heart of her crush when he transfers back to her school. He's changed, but so has she.

title: The Tatami Galaxy
synopsis: A nameless college junior considers the different ways his university life could have gone, and whether he'll ever win the heart of his crush, Akashi.

title: Inuyasha: The Final Act
synopsis: Inuyasha, Kagome and their crew cross the last frontiers in their quest to end Naraku's evil reign and quash the bad karma of the Jewel of Four Souls.

title: Yamato
synopsis: As an elderly Japanese World War II veteran sees the final resting place of the battleship “Yamato,” he thinks back to his to time as a young sailor.

title: Usagi Drop
synopsis: Deciding to raise his dead grandfather's 6-year-old love child, bachelor Daikichi finds that the trials of fatherhood are not for the faint of heart.

title: My Little Monster
synopsis: Shizuku, a hardworking student who isn't interested in socializing, finds an unlikely friend in Haru, an emotionally volatile boy at her school.

title: Apartment 1303
synopsis: After her sister suddenly and inexplicably leaps from the balcony of her new apartment, a woman searches for the sinister truth behind the tragedy.

title: 125 Years Memory
synopsis: Japan gave their all to the survivors of the Ottoman frigate Ertuğrul when it sank in 1890 -- an act of kindness remembered in war-torn 1980s Tehran.

title: Hula Girls
synopsis: When a Japanese mining company announces the closure of a coal mine in Iwaki, a group of brave young women defies their community by signing up to become hula dancers at the company's new Hawaiian tourist center in this heartwarming dramedy.

title: GODZILLA City on the Edge of Battle
synopsis: On Earth, Haruo and his companions make contact with the indigenous Houtua tribe. To defeat Godzilla, they set out for the old Mechagodzilla facility.

title: The Great Passage
synopsis: Shy Mitsuya works on a project with a woman who's his polar opposite -- a collaboration that gives him the courage to pursue the object of his desire.

title: Black Bullet
synopsis: A decade after a virus forces people to live in confinement behind barium walls, two childhood friends with superpowers fight to save the human race.

title: Dragon Ball: Curse of the Blood Rubies
synopsis: Goku must stop the destruction wrought by King Gurumes, who’s been overtaken by an insatiable hunger that only the Dragon Balls can cure.

title: My Rainy Days
synopsis: Wild-child schoolgirl Rio Ozawa isn't above bullying, blackmail, extortion and selling her body for sex -- until an accidental mix-up at a photo kiosk causes her to become intrigued by a suicidal history teacher.

title: Gate
synopsis: After a portal to another world appears in Ginza, JSDF reservist Yoji Itami is sent to investigate the fantastical lands on the other side.

title: Lucky Star
synopsis: High schooler Konata prefers anime, manga and games to homework. Her friends Miyuki, Tsukasa and Kagami don't understand, but they support her anyway.

title: The Twelve Kingdoms
synopsis: The first set in the epic tale of Twelve Kingdoms follows Youko, an ordinary girl from Japan who's escorted into a magical alternate universe. She must find her own way in this strange new world, armed with a mystical sword and her own wits.

title: Nisekoi
synopsis: Raku, the heir to a yakuza family, must fake a relationship with the daughter of a rival faction in order to keep the peace between the two families.

title: Kenichi: The Mightiest Disciple
synopsis: After years of relentless bullying, Kenichi Shirahama learns martial arts from master Miu Furinji, who shows him the way to adventure.

title: KenIchi: The Mightiest Disciple OVA
synopsis: High schooler Kenichi Shirahama and his friend Miu are targeted by the adherents of rival martial arts school Yami, whose goal is to unleash chaos.

title: One Missed Call 3: Final
synopsis: Terror rings again in the third installment of this supernatural horror franchise. Cell phone calls from the future forecast the death of each person who answers, but this time around, the potential victims get a chance to spare their own lives.

title: Meatball Machine
synopsis: A romance between factory workers Yôji and Sachiko is going well -- until aliens invade and Sachiko is attacked and transformed into a slave cyborg.

title: Galaxy Express 999
synopsis: A destitute boy travels on an intergalactic train line with a mysterious woman named Maetel in hopes of fulfilling a promise to his slain mother.

title: My Tomorrow, Your Yesterday
synopsis: A young man falls for a beautiful stranger. But as his love for her grows, he learns her secret and realizes that their time together is fleeting.

title: If Cats Disappeared from the World
synopsis: A dying man who lives alone with his cat makes a deal with the devil to extend his life in exchange for making things disappear from the world.

title: Sakuran
synopsis: In 18th-century Japan, apprentice courtesan Kiyoha (portrayed by Japanese pop superstar Anna Tsuchiya) works in a brothel in the fashionable Yoshiwara district. Determined to gain her independence, Kiyoha refuses to be bought by a wealthy man.

title: B: The Beginning
synopsis: Genius investigator Keith Flick rejoins the royal police force just as serial killer 'B' emerges. Mysterious youth Koku may be an ally, or a target.

title: Postman Blues
synopsis: A postman's mundane life turns chaotic after an encounter with an old friend, now a drug dealer for the yakuza, sets off a chain of improbable events.

title: Sekirei
synopsis: Branded a loser because of his tendency to buckle under pressure, wimpy teen Minato Sahashi turns his life around after discovering he's an Ashikabi.

title: Mutant Girls Squad
synopsis: When young Rin learns she is a descendant of weapon-clawed creatures, she joins a team of fellow mutants who are plotting to defeat their persecutors.

title: Panda! Go Panda!
synopsis: When little Mimiko is left home alone while her grandmother is away on a trip, a panda father and his young son decide to move in.

title: Lovely Complex
synopsis: Risa Koizumi is abnormally tall for a girl, Atsushi Otani is unusually short for a boy. That makes high school romance a challenge for both of them.

title: The Irregular at Magic High School
synopsis: Siblings Tatsuya and Miyuki enroll at Magic High School, where Miyuki's honors status comes between her and her underachieving older brother.

title: Key of Life
synopsis: Hilarity ensues when a struggling actor takes advantage of a hit man with amnesia and the two men trade lives ... with mixed results.

title: Ping Pong the Animation
synopsis: Teenage boys Peco and Smile grew up playing table tennis together and now face grueling competition, forcing them to grow as both athletes and men.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam
synopsis: In Universal Century year 0079, heroic rookie Amuro pilots the Earth Federation's new mobile suit weapon to counter attacks from rebel colonies.

title: Tomie
synopsis: While investigating the murder of teen girl Tomie Kawakami, police uncover a slew of girls also named Tomie who were slain years and decades earlier.

title: Helter Skelter
synopsis: A beautiful young starlet looks perfect in front of the camera, but she hides a dangerous secret and will do anything to maintain her image.

title: Little Witch Academia
synopsis: Akko's unconventional ideas don't go over well at the Magical Academy, but when a dragon is unleashed, she may be the only witch who can save the day.

title: Dragon Ball: The Path to Power
synopsis: In this retelling of the original series, Goku joins Bulma on an epic quest to locate the mystical Dragon Balls known to possess unimaginable powers.

title: Kamisama Kiss
synopsis: A goodhearted teenager who has been abandoned by her deadbeat father accidentally becomes an earth deity with a wily fox spirit as her familiar.

title: Dragon Ball: Sleeping Princess in Devil's Castle
synopsis: Martial arts trainees Goku and Krillin compete for the opportunity to train under Roshi by rescuing the Sleeping Princess from the demon king Lucifer.

title: K: Return of Kings
synopsis: After the death of one of their own, seven Kings and their clans are thrown into disarray when the source of their superpowers is threatened.

title: K
synopsis: A young boy is wanted for a crime he has no recollection of committing and must go on the run, hunted by two powerful kings and their forces.

title: Battlefield Baseball
synopsis: A high school baseball team has a chance to win the famed Koshien Stadium Tournament, but a literally murderous zombie-like team stands in their way.

title: Free!
synopsis: After going their separate ways, four childhood friends now in high school reunite to restore the Iwatobi Swim Club back to its former glory.

title: Date A Live
synopsis: A high school boy’s dating skills might be humanity’s best hope of keeping a mysterious spirit from triggering another horrific natural disaster.

title: Sailor Moon S: The Movie
synopsis: Princess Snow Kaguya's plans to freeze the Earth are put on ice when a young astronomer finds part of her comet. The Sailor Soldiers must fight her!

title: Lady Oscar
synopsis: Passing as a male officer in pre-revolutionary France, a woman is assigned to protect Marie Antoinette while hiding her love for a Swedish nobleman.

title: Terraformars
synopsis: A crew of outlaws arrives to prepare Mars for human colonization, only to find that hyper-evolved, hostile insects have infested the planet.

title: Harmonium
synopsis: Toshio, who owns a small machinery workshop, hires an old acquaintance with a criminal past without consulting with his family first.

title: The Snow White Murder Case
synopsis: When a beautiful office worker is stabbed and set on fire, her murder casts suspicion on a colleague who is tried on television and in the rumor mill.

title: Bakuman. 2
synopsis: Mashiro and Takagi begin working with their new editor, Miura, on their first serialized manga, while Azuki struggles with advancing her own career.

title: Bakuman.
synopsis: Junior high students Moritaka Mashiro and Akito Takagi team up to become manga artists, propelled by a promise from Mashiro's crush, Miho Azuki.

title: Bakuman. 3
synopsis: Mashiro and Takagi begin serializing their new manga, trying to beat their rival Eiji in the rankings, while Azuki starts to land voice actress roles.

title: Tokyo Family
synopsis: A couple travels from rural Japan to Tokyo to visit their grown children, only to find that the kids are too busy to welcome them.

title: Grimgar of Fantasy and Ash
synopsis: Haruhiro is one of a group of people who wake up in a fantasy world with no idea how they got there. Now, they have to learn how to survive.

title: Sailor Moon R
synopsis: When bewitching alien Kisenian threatens to replace the solar system's positive energy with negative waves, youthful adventuress Sailor Moon and her four fellow Sailors jump into action in this feature-length film based on the popular anime series.

title: When They Cry: Kai
synopsis: Still stuck in a time loop in June 1983, Keiichi, Rika and their friends try to avert the tragedy that has befallen their village many times before.

title: Heaven's Lost Property
synopsis: Girl-crazy Tomoki's quiet life gets turned upside down when beautiful, winged Ikaros falls from the sky -- and starts calling him master.

title: Nadia, The Secret of Blue Water
synopsis: A young inventor and a circus performer with a cryptic past embark on an adventure at sea and stumble across a vast and sinister conspiracy.

title: One Piece: The Movie
synopsis: The legendary pirate Woonan left behind a huge treasure, and the pirate El Drago wants it. But Luffy and the Straw Hats are out to find it first!

title: The Perfect World of Kai
synopsis: On a dare, prim Shuhei tries to play a cursed piano in the forest, but only free-spirited Kai can coax sound from the mysterious instrument. But why?

title: Paradise Kiss
synopsis: Bored with her regimented life, high schooler Yukari falls in with a free-spirited group of fashion design students, including the alluring George.

title: Eden of the East the Movie
synopsis: The dramatic final phase of the Seleção game plays out across two films set months after Akira, Saki and their friends saved Japan from catastrophe.

title: DARLING in the FRANXX
synopsis: In a devastated future, humanity's only defense against the monstrous klaxosaurs are the children who pilot the robots known as Franxx.

title: Yakuza: Like a Dragon
synopsis: With a ruthless killer on their tail, former yakuza member Kazuma Kiryu helps a young girl find her mother, who is also his childhood sweetheart.

title: Little Witch Academia
synopsis: Akko enrolls at the Luna Nova Academy for witches. She's not the best student, but her bright attitude is the key to her and her friends' success.

title: Gintama
synopsis: They'll do any job for a price, but when Gintoki and his friends go in search for a serial killer and a cursed sword, they may be out of their league.

title: Rage
synopsis: Months after an unsolved brutal double murder, three drifters resembling the suspect surface in different locations across Japan.

title: Sadako
synopsis: There's an outbreak of teen suicides after the mysterious cursed video from the Ringu trilogy becomes a viral sensation on the Internet.

title: Dragon Ball: Mystical Adventure
synopsis: With Master Roshi's training complete, Goku and Kurilin must now test their skills at the World Martial Arts Tournament hosted by Emperor Chiaotzu.

title: Josee, the Tiger and the Fish
synopsis: A typical university student meets a disabled girl being wheeled around town in a baby carriage. Despite the odds, the two soon begin to fall in love.

title: Gargantia on the Verdurous Planet
synopsis: After falling through a wormhole, a space-dwelling teen mecha pilot awakes to find himself amid the inhabitants of a strange planet called ... Earth.

title: Boy
synopsis: A boy growing up in an abusive and nomadic family of grifters gets increasingly drawn into the family business, to his moral and physical detriment.

title: ReLIFE
synopsis: Underemployed Arata is offered a job -- with a catch: become a tester for 'ReLIFE' and relive a year of high school after rejuvenation treatment.

title: Is This a Zombie?
synopsis: Brought back to life as a zombie by a necromancer, Ayumu Aikawa searches for his killer while helping a magical girl and a vampire ninja battle demons.

title: Sailor Moon SuperS the Movie: Black Dream Hole
synopsis: Queen Valdiana plots to harvest children's dreams, drawing Earth into her Black Dream Hole. The Sailor Scouts must fight for Chibi Moon and the world!

title: 100 Yen Love
synopsis: A dispirited 32-year-old slacker living with her parents sinks into deep despair, until an aging boxer teaches her to fight for her life.

title: Villain
synopsis: When a woman is murdered after humiliating an online date, the case shines a light on the morality of everyone involved, including the victim.

title: A Story of Yonosuke
synopsis: When tragedy befalls a kind, likable man, the people who surrounded him in his younger days gather to share memories of their time together.

title: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid
synopsis: Office worker Kobayashi's boring life changes after she drunkenly saves a dragon. To pay her back, Tohru takes human form and becomes her maid.

title: Midnight Diner
synopsis: A scarred man operates a midnight diner in the backstreets of Shinjuku. No one knows his name or his story, but his customers each bring him theirs.

title: Panty and Stocking with Garterbelt
synopsis: Two raucous angels, Panty and Stocking, are sent from heaven to destroy the evil spirits that feast on human greed inside the walls of Daten City.

title: Little Forest
synopsis: Fleeing heartbreak in the big city, Ichiko returns to her rural hometown to live self-sufficiently, farming and cooking everything she eats herself.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam: The 08th MS Team
synopsis: A vicious guerrilla war in the jungle turns personal when the heroes of Zeon and the Earth Federation discover that they have a history together.

title: Little Witch Academia: The Enchanted Parade
synopsis: When Akko and other troubled students at Luna Nova are assigned to manage the annual witch hunt parade, Akko wants to make the event more positive.

title: A Certain Magical Index
synopsis: Supernaturally gifted teen Tōma teams up with nun Index against evil forces seeking powerful magical texts that have been implanted in Index's mind.

title: A Certain Magical Index II
synopsis: Index and Toma find themselves still hounded by Academy City's warring factions that want access to the forbidden books implanted in Index's mind.

title: Fate/stay night Unlimited Blade Works
synopsis: High schooler Shiro Emiya is caught up in the conflict over the Holy Grail, which can grant any wish, alongside a teen magus and her hostile servant.

title: One Piece: Adventure on Nejimaki Island
synopsis: After everything is stolen from them, the Straw Hats head for Clockwork Island where the Trump Siblings are after the Diamond Clock.

title: ONE PIECE
synopsis: Monkey D. Luffy sails with his crew of Straw Hat Pirates through the Grand Line to find the treasure One Piece and become the new king of the pirates.

title: Monogatari Series 2nd Season
synopsis: Strange anomalies and greater threats manifest around Koyomi Araragi and the girls he comes across as new stories of the odd and occult unfold.

title: The Incite Mill
synopsis: After signing up for a lucrative experiment, ten people find themselves trapped in an underground complex playing a deadly game.

title: Violet Evergarden
synopsis: The war is over, and Violet Evergarden needs a job. Scarred and emotionless, she takes a job as a letter writer to understand herself and her past.

title: Violet Evergarden
synopsis: The war is over, and Violet Evergarden needs a job. Scarred and emotionless, she takes a job as a letter writer to understand herself and her past.

title: Violet Evergarden
synopsis: The war is over, and Violet Evergarden needs a job. Scarred and emotionless, she takes a job as a letter writer to understand herself and her past.

title: The Night Is Short, Walk On Girl
synopsis: One strange night in Kyoto seems to last a year. One hapless college student wants to confess his love to his classmate, but she's on her own journey.

title: Devilman
synopsis: A scientific expedition unleashes demons who begin possessing humans, and teenage friends Akira and Ryo wind up on opposite sides of the struggle.

title: Snow White with the Red Hair
synopsis: When herbalist Shirayuki's unusual hair attracts unwanted attention, she cuts it off and escapes to neighboring Clarines, where she meets Prince Zen.

title: St. Johns Wort
synopsis: Her visions of an old, abandoned house drive a video game artist to find the decaying edifice, where secrets about her forgotten past lie waiting.

title: One Piece: Baron Omatsuri and the Secret Island
synopsis: The Straw Hats visit Baron Omatsuri's island resort, but before they can relax, they must complete the Trials of Hell and unravel the Baron's plot.

title: A Bride for Rip Van Winkle
synopsis: A naive and passive woman's engagement to a man she meets through a matchmaking service goes awry, leading her down a spiral of confusion.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack
synopsis: Thirteen years have passed since the events of the original Mobile Suit Gundam series, and now peace is again threatened by a new Neo Zeon army. Armed with the Nu Gundam mobile suit, Amuro Ray and the Federation forces engage in one final battle.

title: WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!
synopsis: An authority on otome games, socially inept and deranged 15-year-old Tomoko Kuroki desperately tries to fit in upon entering high school.

title: Sword Art Online: Extra Edition
synopsis: This year-end special features a recap as well as new content. Yui wants to see a whale so Suguha must learn to swim. A surprise waits in the water.

title: Nisemonogatari
synopsis: After he survives a vampire attack, high school student Koyomi Araragi experiences supernatural events involving ghosts, gods and mythical beings.

title: Wolf Girl and Black Prince
synopsis: Desperate to fit in, Erika convinces a nice-guy schoolmate to pretend to be her boyfriend. But she soon learns he's not as kind as he seems.

title: Bakuman
synopsis: An aspiring comic artist haunted by the death of his overworked uncle is persuaded to follow his dreams and prepares to break into the industry.

title: Baka and Test
synopsis: At Fumizuki Academy, lowly students can improve their lot by summoning beastly avatars to defeat their classmates in the elite upper classes.

title: Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie: Eternal
synopsis: Kyoko enlists Madoka Kaname's help in turning Sayaka human again, and Homura reveals a shocking secret as she battles the witch called Walpurgisnacht.

title: Kokoro Connect
synopsis: Five high school friends suddenly begin switching bodies. It seems random, until they learn about a mysterious entity called 'Heartseed.'

title: Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie: Beginnings
synopsis: A young girl and her friend are rescued from harm by a magical creature, who offers them a chance to have a wish granted if they will help fight witches.

title: Battles Without Honor and Humanity Dairi Senso
synopsis: In the third film of the gritty yakuza series, loyalties are tested as tensions flare between rival families in the Hiroshima underworld.

title: One Piece: Episode of Alabasta
synopsis: Revolution is brewing in the desert country of Alabasta, but the Straw Hats and Princess Vivi know the truth: it's all a plot cooked up by Crocodile.

title: Anne of Green Gables
synopsis: An orphaned girl is sent to live on a farm, where she stirs up the lives of her guardians, makes new friends, gets into scrapes and chases her dreams.

title: Revolutionary Girl Utena
synopsis: Orphan Utena Tenjo is swept into the secrets and lies of swanky Ohtori Academy, where students secretly duel for the Rose Bride's hand, and her power.

title: Rage of Bahamut: Genesis
synopsis: Long after the fearsome Bahamut was sealed away, one woman steals half the key from the gods. The race is on to prevent an ancient terror's release.

title: Daily Lives of High School Boys
synopsis: In these short episodes, three students at an all-boys high school enjoy hanging out and not doing anything particularly noteworthy or momentous.

title: The Little House
synopsis: A humble young maid observes rising tensions in the household after her employer embarks on an affair with her husband's work colleague.

title: Katanagatari
synopsis: Yasuri Shichika sets out on a quest across Japan to collect the 12 legendary Deviant Blades for the strategist Togame, who asks him to fall in love.

title: Saint Seiya: The Lost Canvas
synopsis: This anime adventure follows the battle between a saint of Athena and an avatar of Hades who's working on a painting that could destroy the world.

title: The Ancient Magus' Bride
synopsis: Fifteen-year-old Chise has nothing and no one to live for. But that changes when she becomes the apprentice and future wife of inhuman mage, Elias.

title: Orange
synopsis: Naho receives letters supposedly from herself ten years in the future. Skeptical at first, she starts to believe when certain events come true.

title: Vibrator
synopsis: After meeting a handsome truck driver at an urban mini-mart, a 30-something writer embarks on a life-changing journey of sexual self-discovery.

title: Shinjuku Swan
synopsis: A penniless Tokyo bum gets a second lease on life when he finds he has a talent for 'scouting' girls to join the yakuza-controlled sex trade.

title: Terrace House
synopsis: Love blooms and personalities collide as six strangers navigate life under one roof in the first reality show of its kind in Japan.

title: Terrace House: Boys and Girls in the City
synopsis: A new set of six men and women start their lives together under one roof. All they get is a fabulous home and a car. As always, there is no script.

title: One Million Yen Girl
synopsis: A young woman who has done some time in jail works a series of odd jobs, continually picking up and starting over somewhere else.

title: Saga of Tanya the Evil
synopsis: Young Tanya is a ruthless military mage with ferocious powers. She's also a reincarnated salaryman trying to stay one step ahead of a godlike entity.

title: The Devil's Path
synopsis: A yakuza member on death row promises to reveal the details of three unsolved murders if a journalist will help him put his former boss behind bars.

title: Castle of Sand
synopsis: A nameless man is found murdered in a rail yard, stumping a pair of detectives as they try to unravel the identity of both the killer and the victim.

title: The Testament of Sister New Devil: Burst
synopsis: Though they're natural enemies, high schooler Basara Tojo fights to protect his stepsisters Maria and Mio from those who desire Mio's heritage.

title: The Testament of Sister New Devil
synopsis: Basara hails from a clan of heroes, but when his father suddenly remarries, he finds himself living with a family of demons.

title: Tokyo Ravens
synopsis: In a time of supernatural chaos, Harutora was born powerless into a magical family. But a reunion with an old friend is about to change everything.

title: Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam
synopsis: Amateur Gundam pilot Kamille Bidan fights with the Anti-Earth Union Group against the tyrannical Earth Federation and its elite Titans task force.

title: Little Princess
synopsis: A girl at a boarding school learns who her true friends are when her life of privilege turns into destitution after her rich father dies bankrupt.

title: Samurai Gourmet
synopsis: Recent retiree Takeshi rediscovers his passion for food and life by getting in touch with his inner warrior and eating what he truly desires.

title: Inugami
synopsis: A young outsider moves into a clannish small town and falls for the mysterious Miki, uncovering a sinister web of spiritual and incestuous forces.

title: Inu X Boku Secret Service
synopsis: An awkward half-demoness moves into a special high-security building for people like her, but she feels stifled by her very loyal personal bodyguard.

title: Mai Mai Miracle
synopsis: A little village girl imagines the glittering and regal past with her shy friend from the city as the realities of present-day post-war Japan set in.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust Memory
synopsis: The crew of the Earth Federation assault carrier Albion tries to recover a stolen nuclear-armed Gundam mobile suit, only to discover a larger plot.

title: Gosick
synopsis: Kazuya Kujo transfers to a school in the Alps infested with spooky rumors. There he meets Victorique de Blois, and together, they solve mysteries.

title: NEKOMONOGATARI -Black-
synopsis: After his friend Tsubasa helps him survive a vampire attack, high schooler Koyomi discovers she's been hiding a secret involving a bandage and a cat.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam III: Encounters in Space
synopsis: With the conflict's end in sight, the Earth Federation prepares to take the war into the Duchy of Zeon's home territory. Gundam pilot Amuro Ray, now a seasoned veteran, returns to space for the final battle.

title: Gamera the Brave
synopsis: A child's pet turtle turns out to be Gamera, a heroic kaiju last seen decades ago sacrificing himself for humanity. Soon, a new threat arises.

title: The Bullet Train
synopsis: A desperate and bankrupt man places a bomb on a bullet train and demands a hefty ransom in exchange for the passengers' safety.

title: The Birth of Saké
synopsis: This film offers a rare peek at the daily life of the artisans of Yoshida Brewery, where devotion and skill combine in the ancient art of saké making.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Blood-C: The Last Dark
synopsis: Saya is part human, part monster, and has one thing on her mind: revenge. How much blood will she shed to cut down the mastermind behind her madness?

title: Oreimo
synopsis: Normal 17-year-old Kyosuke isn't close with his 14-year-old sister Kirino. But then her secret otaku hobby gives them a chance to reconnect.

title: Attack on Titan Crimson Bow and Arrow
synopsis: In a dystopian future world, a young man leads a band of fighters against a plague of giants bent on destroying what remains of humanity.

title: The Ceremony
synopsis: One family's twisted, tragic history is told in parallel to events of post-war Japan via flashbacks of weddings, funerals and other ceremonies.

title: Say 'I Love You'
synopsis: Unexpectedly becoming friends with Yamato, the most popular boy in school, awkward loner Mei discovers first love and all the trials that go with it.

title: Street Mobster
synopsis: After serving time, a defiant street thug is incensed to find his town overrun by two yakuza factions. He gathers his crew and takes them on.

title: Battles Without Honor and Humanity: Final Episode
synopsis: In the final film of the series, yakuza clans have learned to disguise their activities behind legitimate businesses, but war and bloodshed continue.

title: Another Heaven
synopsis: On the trail of a serial killer with a nauseating calling card, detectives slowly realize they are dealing with far worse than a mere madman.

title: Orange
synopsis: Naho Takemiya's high school life is disrupted by letters from her 25-year-old self in the future, begging her to act to save her classmate Kakeru.

title: Ghost Train
synopsis: High school student Nana must face a murderous ghost haunting the subway in order to save her younger sister, who's gone missing in the station.

title: A Certain Scientific Railgun S
synopsis: Mikoto Misaka, one of the highest ranking espers in Academy City, uncovers a plan in which clones of herself are being used for horrific experiments.

title: A Certain Scientific Railgun
synopsis: Mikoto uses her ability to control electricity to help maintain order in Academy City, most of whose inhabitants are mystically gifted students.

title: A Certain Scientific Railgun OVA
synopsis: During a training exercise, esper Mikoto gets the feeling that she's being watched. As her paranoia grows, her friends find she's not the only one.

title: Jormungand
synopsis: Despite his deep hatred of weapons, a child soldier joins a gang of gunrunners in hopes of tracking down those responsible for his family's demise.

title: SHIMONETA: A Boring World Where the Concept of Dirty Jokes Doesn't Exist
synopsis: In a world where lewdness is outlawed, the son of a crude terrorist becomes a conflicted freedom fighter for the erotic insurgent group known as SOX.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam II: Soldiers of Sorrow
synopsis: The Earth Federation warship White Base and its Gundam pilot Amuro Ray struggle to make it back through enemy territory, pursued by Zeon's warriors.

title: One Piece: Episode of Chopper: Bloom in the Winter, Miracle Sakura
synopsis: When Nami falls ill, the Straw Hats seek medical care for her on Drum Island. There they meet reindeer doctor Tony Tony Chopper and the Wapol pirates.

title: Tokyo Ghoul: Jack
synopsis: High schoolers Kisho Arima and Taishi Fura meet while investigating a ghoul's murder of Fura's friend, then work together as members of the CCG.

title: Tatsumi
synopsis: This animated feature pays tribute to comic book artist Yoshihiro Tatsumi, who transformed Japanese comic art with his dramatic storytelling style.

title: Strawberry Shortcakes
synopsis: Illustrator Toko, call girl Akiyo, receptionist Satoko and secretary Chihiro struggle with life in Tokyo as they look for love and friendship.

title: Masamune-kun's Revenge
synopsis: Masamune transformed himself into a high school hottie to get revenge on Aki, the girl who destroyed him. Now he just has to make her fall in love.

title: Higanjima
synopsis: High schooler Akira learns that his vanished older brother Atsushi is still alive -- but he's trapped on an island filled with vampires.

title: Pale Moon
synopsis: Right after the burst of Japan's economic bubble, a lonely banker finds her embezzlement leading her to sexual awakening and financial peril.

title: Love Strikes!
synopsis: Struggling news writer Yukiyo has never been popular with women, until suddenly one day, Miyuki, Rumi, Ai and Motoko all set their sights on him.

title: The Foreign Duck, the Native Duck and God
synopsis: Nervous college student Shiina's new neighbor Kawasaki asks for his help robbing a bookstore. Intrigued, Shiina attempts to unravel Kawasaki's past.

title: L*DK
synopsis: Wanting to finish high school in the same place, Aoi lives alone after her parents move, until popular boy Shusei moves into her apartment.

title: Wolf Girl and Black Prince
synopsis: With her friends growing skeptical, a high school freshman who has invented a fictional boyfriend convinces a handsome classmate to play the part.

title: Sayonara kabukichô
synopsis: A hotel in Tokyo's red-light district hosts all walks of life in 24 hours, including a musician, call girl, maid, porn star, cop, runaway and pimp.

title: HK2: The Abnormal Crisis
synopsis: Following the battle against Ogane, Kyosuke must choose between returning Aiko's panties or continuing to save the world as the heroic Hentai Kamen.

title: Yakuza Burial: Jasmine Flower
synopsis: With the ever-adapting yakuza and corrupt police force colluding for personal gains, a rogue detective is the only thing that stands in their way.

title: Absolute Duo
synopsis: Tor Kokonoe enrolls in Koryo Academy, a school where students train to become peacekeepers using weapons forged out of their souls.

title: Eureka Seven: Good Night, Sleep Tight, Young Lovers
synopsis: A young rebel fighter named Renton becomes obsessed with saving his best friend, Eureka, who was mysteriously kidnapped eight years before.

title: The Chef of South Polar
synopsis: When eight men are assigned to live 14,000 kilometers from home in inhumanly cold conditions, food becomes their new existence.

title: Kamikaze Taxi
synopsis: A yakuza member is on the run after he steals from a corrupt politician. With his family hunting him down, a friendly cab driver helps him escape.

title: Lu Over the Wall
synopsis: Middle schooler Kai's depressing life in a boring fishing village changes drastically when a local mermaid named Lu joins his band.

title: What a Wonderful Family!
synopsis: An ostensibly happy family deals with the suppressed emotions that spill out when their loving matriarch suddenly announces that she wants a divorce.

title: Tiger and Bunny
synopsis: In an alternate New York City protected by a band of superheroes called NEXT, veteran Wild Tiger is forced to team up with rookie Barnaby Brooks Jr.

title: Campione!
synopsis: Retired baseball player Godo Kusanagi travels to Sardinia and winds up becoming a certified god slayer, charged with hunting down heretical deities.

title: Tomie: Replay
synopsis: When the head of a teen girl is extracted from the stomach of a young girl, the hospital staff in attendance disappear under bizarre circumstances.

title: The World God Only Knows
synopsis: High school gamer Keima gets recruited by rookie demon Elsie to banish actual demons by somehow making real life girls fall in love with him.

title: Fate/Apocrypha
synopsis: The theft of the Greater Grail from Fuyuki City leads to a splintered timeline in which the Greater Holy Grail War is waged on an unprecedented scale.

title: Atelier
synopsis: A young 'fabric geek' lands a job at an upscale Japanese lingerie company -- and quickly discovers she'll need help to survive.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: ONE PIECE 3D: STRAW HAT CHASE
synopsis: Luffy realizes that his signature straw hat is missing! The trail leads the crew to an eagle, while Chopper finds an old man connected to the case.

title: Strobe Edge
synopsis: Ninako begins to have feelings for her high school classmate Ren, despite the fact that he's dating Mayuka and Daiki has confessed his love for her.

title: Rurouni Kenshin: Shin Kyoto-Hen
synopsis: Seeking to atone for his bloody past, Kenshin Himura goes to Kyoto to thwart his successor Makoto Shishio's plans to overthrow the Meiji government.

title: Children of the Whales
synopsis: As a magic wielder, young archivist Chakuro knows his time is short, but everything changes when a girl from the outside appears on his island.

title: 10 Promises to My Dog
synopsis: When a young girl wants to adopt a puppy, her mother insists she make promises to her new pet that help carry her through life's twists and turns.

title: Yokame no semi
synopsis: A young woman who was abducted as a baby, then raised for years by her kidnapper, is determined to find out what really happened all those years ago.

title: Kofuku no Kane
synopsis: A blue-collar factory worker, fresh out of a job, ponders his dismal future as a series of extraordinary life-changing events occur.

title: Sengoku jieitai 1549
synopsis: After a Japan Self-Defense Forces squadron is accidentally sent back to the 16th century during an experiment, a new team follows on a rescue mission.

title: Girls und Panzer
synopsis: Miho Nishizumi tries to escape her family's tradition of tankery by enrolling at a new high school. Instead she gets back into the sport with friends.

title: Girls und Panzer Compilation Movie
synopsis: The girls of Ōarai High look back over their eventful year of battling and defeating other tankery teams in this highlight reel compilation.

title: Penguindrum
synopsis: Terminally ill Himari's life is saved by a spirit in a penguin hat. Now her brothers must search for the Penguindrum, with help from actual penguins.

title: Tokyo Idols
synopsis: This documentary follows J-Pop idol Rio and her predominantly middle-aged fans, and their seemingly transactional interactions.

title: Snakes and Earrings
synopsis: A bizarre love triangle forms when an unfulfilled woman meets two male friends who bring out her unexpected sexual attraction to pain.

title: Sleepless Town
synopsis: In the seedy, diverse underworld of Kabukicho, a mixed-race hustler deals with an unwelcome problem from the past while trying to keep his nose clean.

title: Instant Swamp
synopsis: An aimless woman endures a severe run of bad throughout her life, then seeks out her estranged father, the owner of a quirky junk shop.

title: Digimon Adventure tri. Chapter 3: Confession
synopsis: With Meicoomon gone, the DigiDestined struggle to prevent infected Digimon from further harming the real world, but a reboot may be the only answer.
